content: and leave tail long body spots pink to sew in the tail from the make as many as you like head will be used to attach the head to the body at row 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 22 head and row 26 body 2 6inc 12 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 18sc 18 5 4sc increase 4slst 2sc increase 2slst 3hdc increase 3slst 27 6 8sc 4 slip_stitch 4sc 2sl st 6sc 3sl st 27 fo and leave tail long enough for finsihing legs x2 start in pink arms x2 start in pink 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 2 6inc 12 2 6inc 12 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 4 18sc 18 5 single_crochet decrease x6 12 4 18sc 18 change to white change to white 6-14 12sc 12 5 18 single_crochet in blo 18 stuff lightly fo and leave tail long enough for 6-14 18sc 18 sewing 15 single_crochet decrease x6 12 attach between row 20 and 21 on the body stuff single_crochet through both sts across top 6 horns x2 tan fo and leave tail long enough for sewing attach between 1 4sc in magic_ring row 9 and 10 on the body 2-3 4sc 4 do not stuff fo and leave tail long enough for sewing attach on head on row 6-7 two sts above ear straps pink overalls pink chain 40 attach to front corner attach to other end of chain with half_double_crochet chain 5 1 40hdc 40 2 40hdc 40 slip_stitch to back corner and turn 3 40hdc 40 half_double_crochet along the chain 5 4 40hdc 40 slip_stitch back to front corner 5 40hdc 40 fo and leave a tail long enough for 6 40hdc 40 7 40hdc 40 finsihing 8 40hdc 40 +2hdc ch2 and turn starts flap repeat on other side use stitch markers to mark where the straps optional sew buttons on front side start and end i sectioned mine to 4 parts of 10 corners where straps are since there are 40 sts backside attached 1 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 2 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 12 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 13 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 fo and leave tail long enough for finishing frontside attach yarn to front where stitch marker is 1 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 2 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 3 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 4 10hdc ch2 and turn 10 fo and leave tail long enough for finishing fix the overalls to where you want them to sit on your cow then take a piece of yarn long enough for sewing and find the middle of the overalls between the legs take your needle and sew through both sides to tighten the legs to make pant legs pocket red chain 10 in 2nd chain single_crochet 9 1-6 9sc ch1 and turn 9 attach between row 8 and 2 of the frontside of the overalls blackberry begin in purple 1 4sc
